#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define cout2(x, y) cout << x << " " << y <<  endl
#define N 100004

using namespace std;

long long memo[1<<15][16];
int n, k;

long long DP(int mask, int last){
	
	if(mask == 0)return 1;
	long long &ret = memo[mask][last];
	
	if(ret != -1)return ret;
	long long ans = 0;
		
	for(int i = mask, j; i > 0; i -= i&-i){

		j = 31 - __builtin_clz(i&-i);
		if(abs(last - j) <= k)ans += DP(mask^(1<<j), j);
	}
	
	return ret = ans;
}


int main(){

	int tc = 0;
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	
	while(tc--){
		
		scanf("%d%d", &n, &k);
		memset(memo, -1, sizeof memo);
		
		long long ans = 0;
		int mask = (1<<n) - 1;
		
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)ans += DP(mask^(1<<i), i);
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
		
	}

}
